titles.title: Supporting the designation of May as "National Lyme and Tick-Borne Disease and Conditions Awareness Month".
Supporting the designation of May as "National Lyme and Tick-Borne Disease and Conditions Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of National Lyme and Tick-Borne Disease and Conditions Awareness Month to increase public knowledge of Lyme and other tick-borne diseases and conditions, raise awareness about the prevention of tick bites, and advance the vision of finding cures through critical research.
